channel.title: VMProtect Integration Kit
channel.description:
VMProtect (vmpsoft.com) is the new generation software piracy protection solution, one of the most powerful anti-piracy solutions, but it takes some time to add integrate it into your application.
The VMPKit (vmpkit.com) allows to solve this task very easy. VMPKit allows you to integrate activation steps into application using flexible customizable UI and x64/x86 service functions, integrate activation steps into the Inno Setup installation programs.
Also, it is fully compatible with Windows 2K/XP/Vista/Seven, x86 or x64 and know all about new Windows Vista/7 virtualizaton and UAC technologies.
Also, the VMPKit is ready for usage with other software protection systems.
You can find more information on our website: http://vmpkit.com

item.title: VMProtect Integration Kit
